nodes.text: A repulsorlift company was a formation of the Imperial Army.

Repulsorlift companies were comprised of two repulsorlift platoons, and two line platoons for a total of two hundred and twenty personnel, including the command support elements. Thirty-one repulsorlift vehicles were employed by the company; twenty-two combat vehicles, a command vehicle, and eight support vehicles. Each line platoon was assigned to a repulsorlift platoon for transport and deployment into combat.
A repulsorlift company could be augmented by the addition of another repulsorlift platoon and accompanying line platoon, a heavy weapons repulsorlift platoon, and a scout platoon.

The repulsorlift vehicles accompanying the company carry infantry troopers into combat, and also provide fire support after troopers have dismounted, a claim that Wedge Antilles confirmed was accurate due to being shot down over Tieos by them.
